author: marekm3498
content: We still have 4788 in the old form without using systemTxs. It turns out that there are some edge-case differences in how the contract encodes storage trie cells compared to how we encoded them with a direct database save. We've fixed this, but we're going to move to systemTx anyway to avoid such problems in the future
